Tyrael had been waiting for Hydras long enough. With a snort of
derision, he transformed to phoenix mode and flew back to base. He
opened a line with all Tirpreds.

Tyrael: To all Tripredacus units, this is Major Tyrael. Meet up on the
bridge of the ship. We move out soon, so be ready.

It was time to attack and to strike hard. Heads would roll...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> DeathSteel:
> 
> He was getting tired of feeling like he had been shelved. He wondered 
> what Tyrael was up to. He hadn't heard back from his new leader. And 
> Kaiser, his supposed new general hadn't called upon him either. He 
> was getting frustrated. He wanted action and a chance to seek rank. 
> Not rust to pieces in his room. He got up and wandered the halls. He 
> found the main communications room and sat down. He picked up the 
> scanner headset and put it on. Next, he started to adjust some of the 
> dials to start picking up most predacon frequencies and some of the 
> maximal frequencies. He listened to the scanner and hoped he would 
> find out what was going on.
